original_title: レ●プ合法化っ！！！ 澁谷果歩 佳苗るか
overview: Completely reproduce the super-dero delusional world drawn by popular coterie writer Maron ☆ Maron! One day, a town like a city that suddenly becomes a lawless zone due to the news of "Lepe Legalization" announced on TV. Women who cannot accept legalization. The hero commits girls in the city such as a strong female boss and a cheeky sister one after another and makes them conceived! Pride, dreams, believing hearts ... The women who were robbed of everything and dropped into "Acme Hell" soon ... A special collaboration work sent by Kaho Shibuya, the lead actor! !!
title: Legalized Rape!!!
